Articles.Content:
I had a great idea to create a showcase for just movie base ships. i don't think i've seen one of these yet. You could include ships from Star wars, Startrek, or any other movies, just be sure to specify. I don't care if they're fuctional (can use infinite fuel cheat if you want). Also, you don't need the craft files unless you want (some people may want them), it's up to you. Use all the mods you want.

I hope this is a successful showcase

So, what do you say, let's get this started! (i'm trying to make some right now)

Edit: anyone know how i change this from a mod craft to a showcase thread?

Edited October 6, 2013 by Mr.Rocket
